about_the_game:
The peaceful Bamboo Spring was once a small country during the Spring and Autumn Period. At the time, the people were living in great misery due to continued invasions. To protect this country from foreign enemies and prosper, you must devote yourself to rebuilding this land from almost nothing. This game allows you to train your troops and use your diplomatic tricks on other lords. Try your best to uncover the true history of the ancient China!

A Rags-to-Riches Story

In Bamboo Spring, you will start from scratch and build a farming courtyard by your own hand through laborious activities such as logging, mining, farming, animal husbandry, fishing and hunting. In the authentic style of the Spring and Autumn Period, you will accumulate resources by working with your hands and lay a solid foundation for the great cause of revival.

An Experience Based on True History

Each inhabitant in Bamboo Spring carries emotions and secrets, being a part of little-known anecdote from the Spring and Autumn period. Delve into their inner worlds, uncover the historical stories hidden in the country, and bring those dusty pasts to life again.

Taste the Culture of Spring and Autumn Period

This game is based on the historical events of the Spring and Autumn Period in China, and respect for the background of that time when strife and virtue coexisted. You will experience the bones and temperament of the pre-Qin warriors. Furthermore, you will experience the real style of the Spring and Autumn period in this game, bringing you back to the time two thousand years ago.

Plan Tactic before Action

The invasion of foreigners is approaching step by step, you must utilize the workshop to build various weapons, arm your villagers to defend against the invading enemies and guard the peace of your homeland. Using your strategy to eliminate who dares to invade.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 760
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 7700k
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 2048 VRAM; Radeon RX 460 4096 VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Delve into the Spring and Autumn Period, experience an epic journey of rebuilding your country, and build your home in leisure, tranquil and idyllic vibrations. Your sweat and wisdom will pave the way for a difficult but glorious journey.

English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
